verses.roman:
eta bali' prabhure dhari' ghare lañā gelā
tāṅhāra avasthā saba kahite lāgilā

synonyms: eta bali'-saying this; prabhure dhari'-taking Mahāprabhu; ghare—home; lañā gelā—took back; tāṅhāra avasthā—His condition; saba—all of them; kahite lāgilā—began to speak.
translation: Thus all the devotees carried Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu back to His residence. Then they all described to Him what had happened.
